description: A small prusik-minding pulley, great for wilderness rescue or hauling.Aluminum, with anodized aluminum side plates.Large top hole takes a rescue carabiner.Prusik-minding side plate design is great for hauling.Efficient sealed ballbearing sheaves.Low-profile side plate fasteners eliminate hooking up.Overall dimensions are 9 x 5.5cm3cm (1.4in.) sheave diameter, 2.5cm (1in.) tread diameter.Rope size up to 12mm (use 6 to 8mm prusiks).NFPA rated "L" for lightweight use.Minimum breaking strength is 22kN.
name: SMC Micro Prusik Minding Pulley
